Specimen Type: Dermal scrapings, nail clippings, and hair
Purpose: To culture and identify fungal organisms in dermal specimens for accurate diagnosis of dermatophyte and other fungal infections.
Equipment: Incubators (25°C and 37°C), Class II Biological Safety Cabinet, Sabouraud Dextrose Agar plates, Mycobiotic Agar plates, microscope, general microbiological supplies
